title: The Living Human Curiosity Sideshow
description: This limited edition cd-sized book for Definitive Jux Records artist Aesop Rock was packaged with his latest 7 track EP. The book contains lyrics for the 66 songs Aesop has created for his past 5 projects (Float, Labor Days, Daylight, Bazooka Tooth and Fast Cars, Danger, Fire and Knives). The photographs were also specifically taken and illustrated for the book.
author: Aesop Rock
